DatabaseEngineType.description: The database Engine: MySQL: MySql v5.5; MySQL57: MySql v5.7; SQLite; MsSql2012: MS Sql Server 2012 or major; MsSql2008: MS Sql Server 2008 or minor; PostgreSQL: Postgres before v8.3; PostgreSQL83: Postgres after v8.3

SeqEndpoint.description: The SEQ enpoint to collect logs (https://datalust.co/seq)

ApplicationName.description: The field used in SEQ to determine the application source of logs

PublishUrl.description: The real url with base domain used by application when published

FrontendOrigins.description: All the possible frontend urls used to validate the CORS

FrontendConfirmEmailUrl.description: The real frontend url with base domain used by application frontend to confirm user's email (used in the email sent after registration when 'Security:VerifyEmail' is true)

FrontendRecoveryPasswordUrl.description: The real frontend url with base domain used by application frontend to recovery user's password (used in the email sent after change password when 'Security:VerifyEmail' is true)

Secret.description: The secret key used for hashing password

PasswordComplexity.description: 0: No validation; 1: Very weak; 2: Weak (default); 3: Medium, 4: Strong, 5: VeryStrong

VerifyEmail.description: When enabled it forces users registered to validate the email used in registration before to be enabled (default: false)

RecaptchaApiEndpoint.description: The Google Recaptcha API endpoint. Default: https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api/siteverify

RecaptchaEnabled.description: When enabled it validates the login and registration request using the Google Recaptcha API, for more information see: https://www.google.com/recaptcha/about/ (default: false)

RecaptchaMinimumScore.description: The minimun score to validate Google Recaptcha response (between 0 and 1). Default: 0.4

Port.description: The SMTP server ported used to connect (default: 25)

UseSSL.description: When true force using SSL while comunicating to SMTP server (default: false)

IgnoreSSLValidity.description: When true allow skipping validation certificate issues (default: false)

DisableAuthentication.description: When true skip the smtp autentication (default: false)
